Class Board

java.lang.Object
Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board​(int maxPlayers)
    The constructor create a game for the number of players specificed in maxPlayers.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board​(int maxPlayers)
      The constructor create a game for the number of players specificed in maxPlayers. It does not check if the number of players is within acceptable limits as that is supposed to be done in another screen (yet to be implemented).
      Parameters:
      maxPlayers -

  • Method Details

    • movePlayer

      public Squares movePlayer​(Player player, int face)
      moves a player the number of places specified in face. Returns the square player has been moved to.
      Parameters:
      player -
      face -
      Returns:
      Square player moved to.

    • normalizePosition

      public int normalizePosition​(int position)
      Normalize new position. IE rollover position at the end of the board. not implemented properly since java's modulus operator doesn't work the same as it would in maths.
      Parameters:
      position -
      Returns:
      int position corrected to avoid overflow.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Increment currentTurn, rollover if end reached.

    • hasWinner

      public boolean hasWinner()
      USED Checks if only one player is not broke. DOES NOT CHECK if bank is broke.
      Returns:
      true if only one player is not broke; false otherwise.

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner()
      USED. gets last player standing, ie the winner.
      Returns:
      Player that is the last one standing. null otherwise.
